A seatbelt, also known as a seatbelt or lap belt, is designed to restrain you and your passengers in your seat, preventing you from being thrown forward and hitting your head on the steering wheel, dashboard, or other objects in the vehicle. This is especially important in the event of a sudden stop or hard braking, as it can help prevent serious injury or even fatalities from head and neck trauma.
